column4: can anyone please help me i wont to share internet with my friend through LAN how do i give him proxcy? he is in windows and i am in ubuntu
how do i share internet with my friend who is connected through LAN?
no i am not using router
well he is in windows xp so will this work?
I have only one wired network or only one network card i get both LAN and Net from the same wire
my friends internet has expired and i want to give him proxy what do i do?
can anyone help me?
He still needs a internet connection to connect to your proxy you run.
So your friends on the LAN then?
what do i do
Why do you need a proxy to get him on the net?
You said you were on the same LAN?
Then have him connect to the router via wifi then?
Aight, well i dont see why if you are on the same LAN then how he cant connect directly to the switch/router, but anyway, Squid is a web proxy.
how can Squid proxy work? it needs internet in both machines ?
See, this is what you should of said alot earlier.
sorry i dint knew what to say
ok  i will try thanks for help
Squid is also in the repo's.
https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/serverguide/C/squid.html
It explains how to set up squid's conf files. so it will still be a useful howto.
